lead_paragraph: Because of an editing error, a picture caption in some editions on Wednesday with the Sports of The Times column, about the potential for Alex Rodriguez to work with a foundation that educates youth about the dangers of performance-enhancing drugs, misstated the surname of the group’s president, shown with Rodriguez. He is Don Hooton, not Hooten. (His group, the Taylor Hooton Foundation, is named after his son, who committed suicide shortly after he stopped using steroids.).
